Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Cubs entered the game with a strong recent performance, winning 5 out of their last 6 games, and a solid bullpen with a 3.75 ERA and 1.23 WHIP.
The Pittsburgh Pirates were facing a tough season with a below.500 record but had a home field advantage and a strong pitcher in Paul Skenes with a 2.16 ERA and 0.94 WHIP.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was expected to be high-scoring with an over/under of 7.5 and a prediction for a Pittsburgh Pirates win with a score of 5-4.
